subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: What is the capital of Rajasthan?
explanation_en: Jaipur is the capital of Rajasthan.

subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Who is known as the 'Tiger of Mewar'?
question_hi: मेवार के 'तिरुगांव के एकी कौन है?
explanation_en: Raja Man Singh Tomar is known as the 'Tiger of Mewar', while Raja Man Singh I is known as the 'Tiger of Mewar'. Raja Rawal Jaisanghar and Raja Bhagirath Singh are not associated with this title.
explanation_hi: राजकांत्रुगांव को 'मेवार का तारुगांव', बेहरात्रुगांव को 'मेवार का तारुगांव', राजकांत्रुगांव को 'मेवार का तारुगांव', राजकांत्रुगांव को 'मेवार का तारुगांव', राजकांत्रुगांव को 'मेवार का तारुगांव', राजकांत्रुगांव को 'मेवार का तारुगांव', राजकांत्रुगांव को 'मेवार का तारुगांव', राजकांत्रुगांव को 'मेवार का तारुगांव', राजकांत्रुगांव को 'मेवार का तारुगांव', विभिज़ना का तारुगांव को 'मेवार का तारुगांव', राजकांत्रुगांव को 'मेवार का तारुगांव', विभिज़ना का तारुगांव को 'मेवार का तारुगांव', राजकांत्रुगांव को 'मेवार का तारुगांव
explanation_en: Vidyajit is a Rajput king who is considered as the founder of Mewar dynasty and is popular for his bravery. In contrast, Raja Man Singh Tomar, or Vidyajit are not associated with the Mewar dynasty. Raja Man Singh Tomar is a Rajput king who played a vital role in the Chittorgarh Rebellion.
explanation_hi: विभिजना का तारुगांव को मेलना का तारुगांव
explanation_en: Vidyajit is a Rajput king who established the Mewar dynasty and is famous for his bravery. In contrast, Raja Man Singh Tomar and Vidyajit are not tied to the Mewar dynasty. Raja Man Singh Tomar is a Rajput king who played a vital role in Chittorgarh Rebellion.
